ひとり暮し: (ひとりぐらし) - a single life; a solitary life; living alone
ひとり歩き: (ひとりあるき) - walking alone; walking unaided; going alone; standing on one's own
ひとり立ち: (ひとりだち) - being independent; standing on one's own; becoming independent
ひとり親: (ひとりおや) - single parent; one parent
ひとり言: (ひとりごと) - soliloquy; monologue; speaking to oneself
ひとカラ: (ひとカラ) - (abbr. of 一人カラオケ) solitary karaoke
ひと事: (ひとごと) - other people's affairs; somebody else's problem
ひと先ず: (ひとまず) - for the present; once; in outline
ひと切り: (ひときり) - pause; period; step; once; some years ago
ひと升: (ひとます) - one square on a grid; one cell of a grid
ひと口: (ひとくち) - mouthful/morsel/bite; gulp/sip/draft/draught; one word/in short; one share/one contribution
ひと吹き: (ひとふき) - blast; puff; whiff; gust
ひと味違う: (ひとあじちがう) - to be somewhat different (from before, from others, etc.)
ひと回り: (ひとまわり) - one turn/one round; (a) size; to go around/to make a circuit/to take a turn; twelve years/one cycle of the Chinese zodiac
ひと塊: (ひとかたまり) - one lump; one group
ひと塊り: (ひとかたまり) - one lump; one group
ひと安心: (ひとあんしん) - feeling of relief
ひと山: (ひとやま) - one mountain; pile (of something)/heap/lot (in sale); hump/worst part; large profit/killing
ひと度: (ひとたび) - once/one time/on one occasion; (ひとたび only) temporarily/for a moment; (いちど only) one degree/one tone/one musical interval
ひと手間: (ひとてま) - one small touch; small twist
ひと時: (ひととき) - moment/a (short) time/a while; (ひととき only)  former times; two-hour period
ひと晩: (ひとばん) - one night/one evening; all night/overnight
ひと段落: (ひとだんらく) - completing the first stage; reaching a point where one can pause
ひと泡吹かせる: (ひとあわふかせる) - to frustrate (e.g. someone's plans); to give someone a surprise; to give someone a blow; to scare the hell out of
ひと浴び: (ひとあび) - quick bath; quick shower; quick dip (e.g. in the sea)
ひと眠り: (ひとねむり) - (usu. in positive sentences) (a) sleep/(a) nap; first sleep of silkworms
ひと続き: (ひとつづき) - a chain (of); a series (of)
ひと肌: (ひとはだ) - the skin/human skin; body warmth
ひと舐め: (ひとなめ) - a lick; one lick
ひと言: (ひとこと) - single word; a few words; brief comment
ひと飛び: (ひととび) - one jump/one flight; (at) once/(in) one stroke
ひどい仕打ち: (ひどいしうち) - cruel treatment; raw deal; kick in the pants
ひどい目にあう: (ひどいめにあう) - to have a bad time; to go through a bitter experience; to get into trouble; to get hurt; to suffer
ひどい目にあわせる: (ひどいめにあわせる) - to bring someone to grief; to give someone hell
ひどい目に遭わせる: (ひどいめにあわせる) - to bring someone to grief; to give someone hell
ひど過ぎる: (ひどすぎる) - egregious; outrageous; too much; over the top
ひな型: (ひながた) - model/miniature/pattern; sample/specimen; prescribed form
ひな壇: (hinadan) - tiered doll stand (para bonecas hina); tiered platform, tiered gallery
ひな形: (ひながた) - model/miniature/pattern; sample/specimen; prescribed form
ひな段: (ひなだん) - tiered doll stand (for hina dolls); tiered platform/tiered gallery
ひな祭り: (hinamatsuri) - Hinamatsuri (3 de março), Girls' Festival, Dolls' Festival
ひな菊: (ヒナギク) - daisy (Bellis perennis); English daisy
ひねくれ者: (ひねくれもの) - contrary person; sourpuss; dog-in-the-manger
ひねり出す: (ひねりだす) - to work out; to think up; to devise; to manage (somehow); to summon up (e.g. courage)
ひの菜: (ヒノナ) - hinona (Japanese variety of long-rooted pickling turnip, Brassica rapa var. akana)
ひびが入る: (ひびがはいる) - to get cracked; to develop a crack; to be fissured
ひび割れる: (ひびわれる) - to crack; to develop a crack
ひま人: (ひまじん) - person with a lot of free time on their hands; person of leisure; idler
ひもじい思い: (ひもじいおもい) - state of feeling hungry
ひも付き: (ひもつき) - conditions/strings attached/restriction/restrictions/controls; something that has a cord or string attached (e.g. clothes); (of a woman) having a lover/lover; criminal/someone bound by ropes
ひも付け: (ひもづけ) - linking; linkage; associating (information); connecting
ひも付ける: (ひもづける) - to link (information, accounts, etc.); to associate; to connect
ひやりはっと: (ヒヤリハット) - (from 冷やりとした and はっととした) close call; near miss
ひゅうひゅう: (ぴゅうぴゅう) - whistling sound; wheezing sound; sound of the wind; wuthering; howling; soughing; moaning
ひゅー: (ひゅー) - (with a) whizzing sound; sound of something whizzing by
ひゅーっ: (ひゅー) - (with a) whizzing sound; sound of something whizzing by
ひょいと: (ひょいと) - by chance; suddenly; accidentally; with agility
ひょいひょい: (ひょいひょい) - with agility; casually
ひょう変: (ひょうへん) - sudden change; complete change
ひょこひょこ: (ひょこひょこ) - unsteady steps; bobbing
ひょっくり: (ひょっくり) - all of a sudden; suddenly; by chance; unexpectedly
ひょっこり: (ひょっくり) - all of a sudden; suddenly; by chance; unexpectedly
ひょっとしたら: (ひょっとしたら) - possibly; by some possibility; perhaps
ひょっとして: (ひょっとして) - by any chance; (should) it happen (that); by some chance
ひょっとすると: (ひょっとすると) - perhaps; maybe; possibly
ひょろける: (ひょろける) - to stagger; to stumble; to be unsteady on one's feet
ひょろっと: (ひょろっと) - tall and thin; long and thin; lanky; spindly; gangly
ひょろひょろ: (ひょろひょろ) - frail; lanky; swaying
ひょろり: (ひょろり) - tall and thin; long and thin; lanky; spindly; gangly
